action_description: This Action will place your system in Home mode.
This Action will place your system in Away mode.
This Action will place your system in Vacation mode.
This Action will temporarily increase the hot water production in your NIBE system by turning on the temporary lux feature.
This Action will temporarily boost the ventilation speed by switching to "speed 4".

This Action will create a smart home thermostat in NIBE Uplink which will be used for controlling the indoor temperature for the next 7 days. If no update of the values are provided before that, the system will return to its previous settings.
